verses.verse: In the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahasuerus, <S%H325><s%> of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the Medes, <S%H4074><s%> who was made king <S%H4427><s%> over the realm <S%H4438><s%> of the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%>

in the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign <S%H4427><s%> I, <S%H1840><s%> Daniel, understood <S%H995><s%> by the books <S%H5612><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> about which the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> for the accomplishing <S%H4390><s%> of the desolations <S%H2723><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> even seventy <S%H7657><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

I set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> to the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> by prayer <S%H8605><s%> and petitions, <S%H8469><s%> with fasting <S%H6685><s%> and sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> and ashes. <S%H665><s%>

I prayed <S%H6419><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> and made confession, <S%H3034><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Oh, <S%H577><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> and dreadful <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> who keeps <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> with those who love <S%H157><s%> him and keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments, <S%H4687><s%>

we have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and have dealt perversely, <S%H5753><s%> and have done wickedly, <S%H7561><s%> and have rebelled, <S%H4775><s%> even turning aside <S%H5493><s%> from your precepts <S%H4687><s%> and from your ordinances; <S%H4941><s%>

neither have we listened <S%H8085><s%> to your servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> who spoke <S%H1696><s%> in your name <S%H8034><s%> to our kings, <S%H4428><s%> our princes, <S%H8269><s%> and our fathers, <S%H1><s%> and to all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

Lord, <S%H136><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> belongs to you, <S%H1322><s%> but to us confusion of face, <S%H6440><s%> as at this day; <S%H3117><s%> to the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and to all Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who are near, <S%H7138><s%> and who are far off, <S%H7350><s%> through all the countries <S%H776><s%> where you have driven <S%H5080><s%> them, <S%H4604><s%> because of their trespass that they have trespassed against you. <S%H4603><s%>

Lord, <S%H136><s%> to us belongs confusion <S%H1322><s%> of face, <S%H6440><s%> to our kings, <S%H4428><s%> to our princes, <S%H8269><s%> and to our fathers, <S%H1><s%> because we have sinned against you. <S%H2398><s%>
To the Lord <S%H136><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> belong mercies <S%H7356><s%> and forgiveness; <S%H5547><s%> for we have rebelled against him; <S%H4775><s%>

neither have we obeyed <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his laws, <S%H8451><s%> which he set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us by <S%H3027><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets. <S%H5030><s%>

Yes, <S%H3478><s%> all Israel have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> your law, <S%H8451><s%> turning aside, <S%H5493><s%> that they should not obey <S%H8085><s%> your voice: <S%H6963><s%> therefore the curse <S%H423><s%> and the oath <S%H7621><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> has been poured <S%H5413><s%> out on us; <S%H2398><s%> for we have sinned against him.

He has confirmed <S%H6965><s%> his words, <S%H1697><s%> which he spoke <S%H1696><s%> against us, <S%H8199><s%> and against our judges who judged <S%H8199><s%> us, <S%H935><s%> by bringing on us a great <S%H1419><s%> evil; <S%H7451><s%> for under the whole sky, <S%H8064><s%> such has not been done <S%H6213><s%> as has been done <S%H6213><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

As it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> all this evil <S%H7451><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> on us: <S%H2470><s%> yet have we not entreated the favor <S%H6440><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> that we should turn <S%H7725><s%> from our iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> and have discernment <S%H7919><s%> in your truth. <S%H571><s%>

Therefore has Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> watched <S%H8245><s%> over the evil, <S%H7451><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> it on us; <S%H3068><s%> for Yahweh our God <S%H430><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%> in all his works <S%H4639><s%> which he does, <S%H6213><s%> and we have not obeyed <S%H8085><s%> his voice. <S%H6963><s%>

Now, <S%H136><s%> Lord our God, <S%H430><s%> who has brought <S%H3318><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and have gotten <S%H6213><s%> yourself renown, <S%H8034><s%> as at this day; <S%H3117><s%> we have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> we have done wickedly. <S%H7561><s%>

Lord, <S%H136><s%> according to all your righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> let your anger <S%H639><s%> and please let your wrath <S%H2534><s%> be turned away <S%H7725><s%> from your city <S%H5892><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> your holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain; <S%H2022><s%> because for our sins, <S%H2399><s%> and for the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of our fathers, <S%H1><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and your people <S%H5971><s%> have become a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to all who are around us. <S%H5439><s%>

Now therefore, <S%H430><s%> our God, listen <S%H8085><s%> to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of your servant, <S%H5650><s%> and to his petitions, <S%H8469><s%> and cause your face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> on your sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> that is desolate, <S%H8076><s%> for the Lord <S%H136><s%>'s sake.

My God, <S%H430><s%> turn <S%H5186><s%> your ear, <S%H241><s%> and hear; <S%H8085><s%> open <S%H6491><s%> your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> our desolations, <S%H8074><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> which is called <S%H7121><s%> by your name: <S%H8034><s%> for we do not present <S%H5307><s%> our petitions <S%H8469><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you for our righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> but for your great <S%H7227><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%>' sake.

Lord, <S%H136><s%> hear; <S%H8085><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> forgive; <S%H5545><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> listen <S%H7181><s%> and do; <S%H6213><s%> don't <S%H408><s%> defer, <S%H309><s%> for your own sake, <S%H430><s%> my God, because your city <S%H5892><s%> and your people <S%H5971><s%> are called <S%H7121><s%> by your name. <S%H8034><s%>

While I was speaking, <S%H1696><s%> and praying, <S%H6419><s%> and confessing <S%H3034><s%> my sin <S%H2403><s%> and the sin <S%H2403><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and presenting <S%H5307><s%> my supplication <S%H8467><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> for the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> of my God; <S%H430><s%>

yes, <S%H1696><s%> while I was speaking in prayer, <S%H8605><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> Gabriel, <S%H1403><s%> whom I had seen <S%H7200><s%> in the vision <S%H2377><s%> at the beginning, <S%H8462><s%> being caused to fly <S%H3286><s%> swiftly, <S%H3288><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> me about the time <S%H6256><s%> of the evening <S%H6153><s%> offering. <S%H4503><s%>

He instructed <S%H995><s%> me, <S%H1696><s%> and talked with me, <S%H559><s%> and said, Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> I am now come forth <S%H3318><s%> to give you wisdom <S%H7919><s%> and understanding. <S%H998><s%>

At the beginning <S%H8462><s%> of your petitions <S%H8469><s%> the commandment <S%H1697><s%> went forth, <S%H3318><s%> and I have come <S%H935><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> you; <S%H2532><s%> for you are greatly beloved: therefore consider <S%H995><s%> the matter, <S%H1697><s%> and understand <S%H995><s%> the vision. <S%H4758><s%>

Seventy <S%H7657><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> are decreed <S%H2852><s%> on your people <S%H5971><s%> and on your holy <S%H6944><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> to finish <S%H3607><s%> disobedience, <S%H6588><s%> and to make an end <S%H8552><s%> of sins, <S%H2403><s%> and to make reconciliation <S%H3722><s%> for iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and to bring in <S%H935><s%> everlasting <S%H5769><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and to seal up <S%H2856><s%> vision <S%H2377><s%> and prophecy, <S%H5030><s%> and to anoint <S%H4886><s%> the most <S%H6944><s%> holy. <S%H6944><s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore and discern, <S%H7919><s%> that from the going forth <S%H4161><s%> of the commandment <S%H1697><s%> to restore <S%H7725><s%> and to build <S%H1129><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to the Anointed <S%H4899><s%> One, <S%H5057><s%> the prince, shall be seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks, <S%H7620><s%> and sixty <S%H8346><s%> - two <S%H8147><s%> weeks: <S%H7620><s%> it shall be built <S%H1129><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> with street <S%H7339><s%> and moat, <S%H2742><s%> even in troubled <S%H6695><s%> times. <S%H6256><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> the sixty <S%H8346><s%> - two <S%H8147><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> the Anointed <S%H4899><s%> One shall be cut off, <S%H3772><s%> and shall have nothing: <S%H5971><s%> and the people of the prince <S%H5057><s%> who shall come <S%H935><s%> shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> and the sanctuary; <S%H6944><s%> and its end <S%H7093><s%> shall be with a flood, <S%H7858><s%> and even to the end <S%H7093><s%> shall be war; <S%H4421><s%> desolations <S%H8074><s%> are determined. <S%H2782><s%>

He shall make a firm <S%H1396><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with many <S%H7227><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> week: <S%H7620><s%> and in the midst <S%H2677><s%> of the week <S%H7620><s%> he shall cause the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and the offering <S%H4503><s%> to cease; <S%H7673><s%> and on the wing <S%H3671><s%> of abominations <S%H8251><s%> shall come one who makes desolate; <S%H8074><s%> and even to the full end, <S%H3617><s%> and that determined, <S%H2782><s%> shall wrath be poured <S%H5413><s%> out on the desolate. <S%H8074><s%>
